alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 1:35PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Showers and embedded thunderstorms with heavy rain will impact portions of west central Barnstable, Plymouth, central Bristol, northeastern Washington, Newport and eastern Bristol Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 132 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking numerous showers and a few thunderstorms moving across southeast Massachusetts. The showers are accompanied by heavy rainfall which may produce up to an inch of rain in an hour. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Plymouth, Taunton, Dartmouth, Bridgewater, North Kingstown, Marshfield, Newport, Bristol, Marion, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Somerset, Scituate, Pembroke, Portsmouth and Middletown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
